    • Uses of AbstractSensor in org.commonreality.sensors.aural

      Subclasses of AbstractSensor in org.commonreality.sensors.aural 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultAuralSensor
      quick and easy way to get sounds out to the system is to extend this sensor and use DefaultAuralSensor.queueSound(IRealObject) with the results from DefaultAuralSensor.newSound(String[], String, double, double) or DefaultAuralSensor.newVocalization(String, double, double, IIdentifier).

    • Uses of AbstractSensor in org.commonreality.sensors.base

      Subclasses of AbstractSensor in org.commonreality.sensors.base 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BaseSensor
      skeletal sensor that utilizes a PerceptManager to create and process percepts based on some other listening mechanism.

    • Uses of AbstractSensor in org.commonreality.sensors.keyboard
